Name: Jelly Belly Beany
Ingredients: 40 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Jelly Bean sweets.
Review: It's a sweetie but you're going to enjoy chewing on it.
History: Created in 2002 at Hush, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Jelly Belly Beany contains 182 calories
